loc-1764181750885.name: The Haunted Keep of Eldoria
loc-1764181750885.description: A crumbling keep once the seat of power for the fallen kingdom of Eldoria, now overgrown with twisted vegetation and haunted by the restless spirits of its former rulers. The once-great halls are in ruins, filled with ancient relics that radiate dark magic.

features.name: The Whispering Well
features.description: A pond in the keep's courtyard that emits an eerie, low hum. Whispers can be heard if one listens closely.

features.name: The Crumbling Library
features.description: Books and scrolls scattered throughout the library are covered in cryptic symbols and warn of a great evil awakening.

currentScene.name: Whispers from the Ashes
currentScene.description: As you approach the crumbling walls of the Haunted Keep of Eldoria, the air grows thick with sorrow and decay. The once-majestic structure now lies in ruin, its towers twisted by time and shadow. The echoes of a thousand restless spirits seem to call out from within, their voices growing louder as you near the entrance. In one of the halls, an ancient relic pulses with dark energy, drawing the attention of those who dare to venture into this forsaken place.
